question: when do the walking dead comics come out
api_result: The "Walking Dead" comic series, created by Robert Kirkman, Tony Moore, and Charlie Adlard, originally began publication in October 2003 and concluded with issue #193 in July 2019. The series was released on a monthly basis during its run. If you're looking for specific issues or collections, they have been compiled into various trade paperbacks and deluxe editions, which are available for purchase. If you're interested in any new content related to "The Walking Dead," such as spin-offs or related series, please specify, and I can provide more information!
